name: Train, Test, Validation
desc: The three sets the data set is splitted on in order to train, test and validate the model.

name: Machine Learning
desc: The scientific study of algorithms and statistical models that computer systems use to effectively perform a specific task.

name: Artificial Intelligence
desc: A machine ability to interpret data, to learn from data and to adapt for achieving specific tasks.

name: Recommendation System
desc: A system that tries to make predictions on user preferences and make recommendations which should interest customers.

name: Outlier Detection
desc: Identification of rare observations which raise anomalous by differing significantly from the majority of the data.

name: Reproducibility
desc: The model will produce the same output for other users when provided with the same input data.

name: Supervised Learning
desc: Machine Learning task of learning a function that maps an input to an output based on example input-output pairs.

name: Unsupervised Learning
desc: To learn the relationships between observations in a data set and classify the raw data without labels.

name: NLP
desc: Natural Language Processing: is a subfield of Artificial Intelligence focused on enabling computers to understand and process human languages.

name: Time Series Analysis
desc: Methods for analyzing time series data in order to extract meaningful statistics and other characteristics of the data.
